msg.msgText: A call to createConnection() or to the ImaProperties validate() method failed because the property {0} was set to {2}. The value must be one of: {1}.

msgExplanation.p: The createConnection() method requires a valid setting for the Protocol property. ImaProperties validation for the Protocol property and for other properties with enumerated values requires supported values for the enumeration to be provided.

msgUserResponse.p: Use one of the enumerated values provided in the error message.
